remarks: The predicate "is a magma" for a structure with a nonempty base set. (Contributed by AV, 29-Jan-2020.)
statement:
ismgmn0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
ismgmn0.o $e |- .o. = ( +g ` M ) $.
ismgmn0 $p |- ( A e. B -> ( M e. Mgm <-> A. x e. B A. y e. B ( x .o. y ) e. B ) ) $.
$d .o. x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d M x y $.
